title: Compiler panicked once, next compilation succeeded

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Happened once only, on second try the compilation succeeded. ### Code ```Rust // Impossible to provide full example.. apologies! pub fn hash64_fare_id_key(v1: u64, v2: &str, v3: &str, v4: &str) -> u64 { let mut hasher = XxHash64::with_seed(0); hasher.write(&v1.to_be_bytes()); hasher.write(&v2.as_bytes()); hasher.write(&v3.as_bytes()); hasher.write(&v4.as_bytes()); hasher.finish() } ``` ### Meta ``` rustc 1.62.1 (e092d0b6b 2022-07-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: e092d0b6b43f2de967af0887873151bb1c0b18d3 commit-date: 2022-07-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.62.1 LLVM version: 14.0.5 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 21647 but the index is 8388726', compiler/rustc_span/src/symbol.rs:1881:9 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 21647 but the index is 8388726', compiler/rustc_span/src/symbol.rs:1881:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fce3edeefbd - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h8e036432725b1c57 at /rustc/e092d0b6b43f2de967af0887873151bb1c0b18d3/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7fce3edeefbd -
